page.title: 13Barkestone food fancies
page.content: The most popular cafes are Mc Donalds, Wimpeys and Kentucky fried chicken because the food is fast to get.The big Mac from Mc Donalds is like this.There is half a cob then a beefburger then a bit of lettuce then another beefburger then the other piece of cob.These are the favourite foods in the school.Hughs favourite food is steak and kidney pie.Fionas favourite food is sausages and baked beans.Victorias favourite food is fish cakes and chips.Josephines favourite food is chicken pie Toris favourite food is chicken pie and gravy Jennys favourite food is spaghetti Tims favourite food is cold turkey chips and peas.Martins favourite food is fish fingers and chips Karls favourite food is cheese pie Matthew likes fish and chips.
